subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: this damned protection debate--Bruce
author: Lisby
full_text:
Frank's comment is germane to my experience as well.

Ann

On Jan 18, 2008, at 8:29 PM, LC Duplatt wrote:

> FS:
>
> Fantastic comment you made: "It's just something that doesn't want
> you to wake up." That is right on in my opinion...if they can create
> fear in a person, then they can manipulate that person. Fear is the
> doorway to losing power and control.
>
> Think about the playground bully who takes people's lunch money until
> a kid half his size calls his bluff by smacking him in the mouth. ;)
>
> LC
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Frank Sumption" <franks-boxes@...>
> wrote:
> >
> > I don't know, but I tend to doubt it. I used to get all kinds of
> > crap, they even threatened to poison my coffee! I didn't quit
> > drinking coffee, I just tell them to to bring it. They've always
> > turned out to be paper tigers--nothin' there. It's just something
> > that doesn't want you to wake up.
> >
> >
> >
> > Frank-S
> >
> > \ --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Robin Searcy Henson"
> > <MudPuddleFarm@> wrote:
> > >
> > > You don't have to name names.. I remember! Are they really
> > demonic? Do you know why they have to receive an invitation before
> > they can enter? I won't be so blasé in the future.
> > >
> > > Robin
> > >
> > >
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: Frank Sumption<mailto:franks-boxes@>
> > > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
> > > Sent: Friday, January 18, 2008 3:31 PM
> > > Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: this damned protection debate--Bruce
> > >
> > >
> > > That sounds all too familar..without naming names.
> > >
> > > Frank-S
> > >
> > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>,
> > bruce halliday
> > > <paranormalinvestigating@> wrote:
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > Robin,
> > > >
> > > > It's never a good idea to invite any spirits into your home.
> > > > Some demonic spirits have to be invited in before they can
> > > > enter, there are instinces where people have heard knocks on
> > thier
> > > > front door only to answer the door and have no one there.
> > > > The knocking by an entity and the opening by the physical
> being
> > > > symbolises the request to come in and the invitation of the
> > open
> > > door.
> > > >
> > > > If you give out a ready made invitation, it could be like
> that
> > > annoying
> > > > relative that comes to visit and never leaves.
> > > >
> > > > So be very careful whenever summoning any unknown entities.
> > > >
> > > > If you need help with your box research or have any questions
> > > > don't hesitate.
> > > >
> > > > Bruce
> > > > Bruce Halliday
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > To: EVP-ITC@: MudPuddleFarm@: Fri, 18 Jan 2008 10:49:53 -
> > > 0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] this damned protection debate--Bruce
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > Yes Bruce, "We want to kill you" is word for word what I
> hear.
> > > Thank you for being the first person ever to validate this for
> > me,
> > > because now I know it's REAL, I'm not crazy, and it isn't my
> > > imagination. This was captured on a digital voice recorder
> while
> > I
> > > was heating coffee in the microwave oven nearby, and I felt
> that
> > the
> > > microwave must have been a powerful energy source for
> > the "speaker."
> > > It may be important to note that I had just invited spirits
> > inside
> > > the house from outside, and that after I listened to this
> message
> > I
> > > told them to go back outside because they were too rude to
> > continue
> > > talking to. I've tried to replicate this experiment a number of
> > > times since then (without the verbal invitation into my home)
> and
> > > have had no luck whatsoever.
> > > >
> > > > Gleefully moving on to box research!
> > > >
> > > > Robin
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: bruce halliday
> > > > To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com<mailto:evp-itc%40yahoogroups.com>
> > > > Sent: Friday, January 18, 2008 5:18 AM
> > > > Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] this damned protection debate--Bruce
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > Robin, In the evp file you posted I believe I'm hearing "we
> > want to
> > > kill you"please let me know if that is what you hear. Robin, I
> am
> > > glad to hear that the protection ritual will be utilized by you
> > in
> > > the purpose it was intended. To give any individual that wants
> to
> > > anopportunity to use it. You will find many forms of
> interaction
> > on
> > > this group, running the gamut from total agreement to calm
> > > debate /discussion. To full blown arguments. That is what makes
> a
> > > group, If everyone followed one single ideology and the ideas
> of
> > any
> > > single person without questionit would not be a group it would
> be
> > a
> > > cult. Welcome to the wonderful world of box research robin, I'm
> > sure
> > > you will be a valued member and researcher in this community.
> > Bruce
> > > > Bruce Halliday
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > To: EVP-ITC@: MudPuddleFarm@: Thu, 17 Jan 2008 22:38:57 -
> > > 0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] this damned protection debate--Bruce
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > I'm still giving this topic a lot of thought because I
> > absolutely
> > > believe in the power of prayer, the power of positivity, and
> the
> > > power of ritual. When I first started recording EVP a couple of
> > > years ago I was warned to expect negative responses, so when it
> > > happened to me I felt elated rather than frightened or
> > distressed. I
> > > will ask again: What physical or psychic harm is a disembodied
> > > entity capable of doing? Please listen to the one EVP I've
> posted
> > on
> > > this board and tell me what, if anything, you hear. I know what
> I
> > > hear, and I consider it distinctly threatening; yet, this is
> the
> > > response that has created the determination in me to continue
> > > researching the unknown.
> > > >
> > > > Bruce, I am in awe of your recordings. I only want to learn
> as
> > > much as I can from you and the other dedicated researchers on
> > this
> > > board. It never occurred to me to use a protection ritual in
> the
> > > past, and that's about all I can say. I will probably use one
> > from
> > > this point on, maybe not so much to repel evil as to attract
> > > goodness.
> > > >
> > > > So, thank you for this contribution. I think the debate has
> > been
> > > an excellent one, and I've appreciated the opportunity to be
> > > enlightened.
> > > >
> > > > Robin
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: bhali333
> > > > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>
> > > > Sent: Wednesday, January 16, 2008 8:06 AM
> > > > Subject: [EVP-ITC] this damned protection debate
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > I swore I would not get wraped up in this debateBUT!The
> reason
> > I
> > > came up with this whole protection ritual was that some of the
> > new
> > > researchers whereexpressing a rational concern for negative
> > responces
> > > that they were recieving through thier boxes.The short
> protection
> > > ritual that I posted is not meant to quell irrational
> histerical
> > > fear, and I agreewith rosemary that anyone suffering from such
> > fear
> > > should rethink thier involment in the paranormal research
> > field.that
> > > being said, It was only meant as a source of subliminal comfort
> > to
> > > those new individuals that had never expperienced spiritual
> > > negativity. And to help ease them into aproaching a session
> > > eventually with confidenceand determination as well as full
> > > curiousity for all types of the communication we recieve.My
> > initial
> > > post of the ritual file was done with the best of intentions
> and
> > > meant to be another tool available for those who felt they
> needed
> > or
> > > wanted to employ it. it is a simple innocent prayer ritual, I
> > don't
> > > think it is really worthy of all this debate.Use it, don't use
> > it.
> > > It's there if you want it. Also I must say there are two kinds
> of
> > > fear the kind that is natural and a god given emotion for self
> > > preservation, ie the fright and flight reflex that is an
> > instinctive
> > > trait in all of us. Then you have the irrational dibilitating
> > phobic
> > > fear that can turn an individual into a frozen statue. That
> type
> > of
> > > fear I believe is unhealthyand should be addressed and dealt
> with
> > and
> > > learned how to harness. I also believe that anyone that harbors
> > that
> > > type of fear would not be drawn to the paranormal anyway and in
> a
> > > case of such fear it would already be present and doing a small
> > > protection ritual would not fuel it any further. So lets take
> it
> > for
> > > what it is, something to utilize in our box of tools like an
> emf
> > > meter.you may have an old rusty odd sized wrench at the bottom
> of
> > > your tool box at home that you inherited from your grandfather
> > and
> > > have never usedbut if you come across that odd nut that needs
> > > tightening somedsy you will be glad you have it.Bruce
> > > >
> > > > Need to know the score, the latest news, or you need your
> > Hotmail®-
> > > get your "fix" Check it out.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
